class_notes: This section is for MN+MSN semester 4 students only.
course_description: Using palliative care principles, the student will gain the knowledge/skills/attitudes to understand and enhance the quality of life when caring for persons across the lifespan with serious, acute and chronic progressive diseases.
sections: Class Nbr: 1524, Section #: 400, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 10a-12:15p, Instructor: W. Zhang, Status: Open
